mapper.select:
select city_id AS cityId,city_code AS cityCode,city_name AS cityName, province_id AS provinceId,province_name AS provinceName,fist_char AS fistChar, 0 AS cityType from city_info where is_active=1 AND province_id not in (110000,120000,500000,310000,0)
and city_name like concat(concat('%',#{cityName}),'%')
order by fist_char asc
